column4: I recently installed Windows Vista on a small partition on my Ubuntu laptop. However, grub no longer pops up to let me boot back in to Ubuntu. How can I fix that?
you should have installed windows first and made life a whole lot easier
Trust me, having windows is always the LAST option. :-P
haha true, but it is a good idea to have a tiny partition dualboot for those rare occaisions, or atleast use vmware
